lead_paragraph: The man who allegedly handled finances for a far-reaching corruption scheme in Guatemala has testified that the then-vice president's right-hand man told him that bribes were going to his boss and the president.

headline.main: Testimony in Guatemalan Fraud Case Implicates Leaders
headline.print_headline: Testimony in Guatemalan Fraud Case Implicates Leaders

snippet: The man who allegedly handled finances for a far-reaching corruption scheme in Guatemala has testified that the then-vice president's right-hand man told him that bribes were going to his boss and the president.
